channel.title: AI on The Quiescent Current
channel.description: Recent content in AI on The Quiescent Current

item.title: My First Logic Program
item.description: This semester, I’m taking an introduction to artificial intelligence, and despite this being the second week, I’ve learned a great deal. Our second assignment was to implement a program in clingo (clasp on gringo) which is a derivative of Prologue. This is my first experience with a logical programming language, and I am intrigued to the possibilities.
